content: crochet flower power square a versatile square that can be used for many projects like blankets table mats or bags why not add some to an old garment to spruce it up the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size approx - 5 x 5 inches level intermediate copyright ©2021 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-flower-power-square/
